revised_title: The Development and Function of the Supra-Renal, Thymus, and Thyroid Bodies
tldr: The author, John Goodsir, examines the development and function of the supra-renal, thymus, and thyroid bodies, which are remnants of the blastoderm layer in embryos. These organs retain their original cellular structure throughout their existence. The study provides insights into the physiological and anatomical significance of these organs.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
